data.title: Abigail Vannice on LinkedIn: Being granted the honor to have been selected for the Husky 100 has‚Ä¶
data.meta_description: Being granted the honor to have been selected for the Husky 100 has empowered me to address the challenges faced by many. Sharing my story of resilience‚Ä¶
data.text:
üåü **Celebrating a Milestone at Weld Seattle: 100,000 Nights of Safe, Dignified Housing** üåü üëè In less than five years, our community has achieved something remarkable. Together, we've provided **100,000 nights of shelter** to individuals rebuilding their lives after incarceration, battling homelessness, and overcoming substance use disorder. üè† Through the Weld Housing Program, we've transformed unused properties into sanctuaries of hope and transformation. This success isn't just ours‚Äîit's a testament to the power of community support and belief in second chances. üå± Each night of shelter means a step towards recovery, self-discovery, and a new beginning. As Jody Bardacke, our Housing Director, says, "It's about creating space for people to find their own way." ü§ù This milestone is a reminder of the work still ahead. Our journey continues, fueled by the dedication of our staff, the generosity of our partners, and the support from each one of you. üîó To keep this momentum, we need your continued support. Every contribution makes a difference. Visit [https://lnkd.in/gMHZ_qyK) to be a part of this transformative journey. Let's aim higher and reach further, for every individual deserves a chance at a new start. üåü #WeldSeattle #CommunitySupport #RecoveryJourney #NewBeginnings #HousingForHope

"Effective community intervention programs have become instrumental in addressing the root causes of delinquency. These initiatives encompass a broad spectrum of strategies, including early intervention, educational support, mentoring, and conflict resolution. The emphasis on rehabilitation over incarceration has shown promising results in reducing repeat offenses and enhancing community safety." https://lnkd.in/g75tjVZy Life Decisions is helping youth get back on track, stay out of trouble and reach healthy adulthood. We cannot do what we do, without the support and investment of the community. Partner with us by supporting the work we do. Together, Bringing Restoration to Rockford. https://lnkd.in/g6j2_X7Q

üíõ Since our last annual survey Kinship has been able to secure phenomenal coverage in the press, including The One Show, BBC News, Channel 5 News, The Metro, The Big Issue and much more. ‚ùó Without your survey responses we are simply not able to keep #KinshipFamilies and the support they need in the media spotlight. ‚úÖ If you're a #KinshipCarer from England or Wales, help Kinship understand the state of the nation for #KinshipFamilies by completing our 2023 Annual Survey: https://loom.ly/ZmWLlvg #ValueOurLove

"I have lost everything in life, I'm not willing to lose my dogs". From providing companionship and emotional support, to fostering a sense of responsibility and routine, owning a dog can be a lifeline for someone experiencing homelessness. We recently partnered with Dogs Trust to update our open-source image library with a collection of realistic and respectful photographs depicting how people experience homelessness as dog owners. In our latest blog by Jenny Stavisky, Clinical Research Manager at Vetpet, we explore the benefits and barriers that dog ownership can create for people experiencing homelessness. https://lnkd.in/eRzudq5n

Ensuring your child's safety is paramount, but the struggle with inadequate resources can be a harsh reality for most families. #Carseat #safety shouldn't be a source of frustration; it's an essential #education. Our Car Seat Assistance Program is a vital #resource for families. We don't just provide car seats; we deliver a comprehensive education on child safety. This story narrated by Liz can be prevented. Your assistance in providing a family with a car seat can be the difference in saving a child's life during an accident. Contribute here https://lnkd.in/dn5-WeBW to provide parents with the resources to ensure their child has the safest environment possible. üíªWebsite: https://lnkd.in/g3eJHUbd üìçWalzem Location: 8102 Midcrown Dr., Windcrest, Tx 78239 ‚òéÔ∏èFor information: 210-504-8015 #LatchedSupport #Staylatched #texas #impactorganization #community #advocacy #familysupport
